main_title.description: The main heading or title of the slide, typically summarizing its purpose or content

content_bullets.description: A list of bullet points or key content items providing supporting details or main ideas

main_image.description: A central image or visual representation used to support the content or convey information visually

presenters.description: Details about the presenter(s) or contributors related to this slide

background_information.description: Additional contextual or background information that provides more clarity or context for the slide content

acknowledgments.description: Recognition or credit given to individuals, organizations, or sources associated with the content or creation of the slide

data.description: Numerical or visual data, such as charts, graphs, or statistics displayed on the slide
